ROBERT F. SCHENKKAN
Director
MARYE D. BENJAMIN
Radio-Television Script Editor
May 28, 1959
Mr. William G. Harley
President, NAJEB
Radio Hall
The University of Wisconsin
Madison 6, Wisconsin
Dear Mr. Harley:
For advance publicity in connection
with the Region V Convetion, may we
have from you within the next few days
some personal background information,
and a glossy-print photograph (if con¬
venient)?
We look forward to seeing you in June.
jrdially, /) '
